howToGetIt: BACR Please follow these steps to apply for Before School Program: 1) Go to Application Website: https://bacr.force.com/afterschool/s/login/ 2) Create an Account (If you have an account, please log into your account) 3) Select "New Registration" 4) Select 'Lawton (SFUSD)', ‘INSERT TERM’ (choose appropriate year) - After School... - Before School Useful tips: It is recommended that families to put siblings applying for the same program on the same registration so that their fees are accurately calculated. Don't forget to fill out all of the red star fields and click on SUBMIT at the end of the registration.
